member.summary: Defines an HTTP connection that allowes feeds received from a given destination.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedInputChannel
member.summary: Defines a connection that allows RSS feeds to be received from a given destination.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Rss.IFeedInputChannel
member.summary: Defines the members for a feed input channel.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.IFeedInputChannel.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous receive operation.
member.param: An System.AsyncCallback that represents the callback method.
An object that can be used to access state information of the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The System.IAsyncResult that identifies the asynchronous request.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.IFeedInputChannel.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous receive operation.
member.param: The System.IAsyncResult that identifies the asynchronous receive operation to finish.
member.returns: A Feed object that is received.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.IFeedInputChannel.Receive
member.summary: Receives a message on the channel.
member.returns: A Feed object that is received.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FeedInputChannel class with the specified destination.

member.summary: The destination URL of the feed input

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedInputChannel.Closed
member.summary: Returns true if the connection is closed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedHttpInputChannel.#ctor(System.Uri,OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedHttpTransport)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FeedHttpInputChannel class with the specified destination and transport.
member.param: An Uri that represents the target destination for the channel.
A FeedHttpTransport that represents the transport for the channel.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedHttpInputChannel.BeginReceive(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts asyncronous retreival of the RSS Feed.
member.param: An System.AsyncCallback that represents the callback method.
An object that can be used to access state information for the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The System.IAsyncResult that identifies the asynchronous request.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.FeedHttpInputChannel.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous receive operation.
member.param: The System.IAsyncResult that identifies the asynchronous receive operation to finish.
member.returns: A Feed object that is received.

member.summary: Helper class.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.DateTimeExt.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an ISO 8601 date to a DateTime object. Helper method needed to deal with timezone offset since they are unsupported by the .NET Framework.
member.exception: On format errors parsing the datetime

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.DateTimeExt.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parse is able to parse RFC2822/RFC822 formatted dates. It has a fallback mechanism: if the string does not match, the normal DateTime.Parse() function is called.
member.exception: On format errors parsing the datetime

member.summary: Helper to test strings.
member.returns: True, if 'text' was null or of length zero

member.summary: Return the size of a string in byte. Consider, if it is null.

member.summary: Return the length of a string. Consider, if it is null.

member.summary: Cuts the provided string at allowedLength - 3 (ellipsis length)

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Rss.Utils.StringHelper.GetFirstWords(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the first amount of words defined by 'wordCount' contained in 'text'.
member.param: Amount of words to look for
member.returns: String containing only the first x words.
member.remarks: Word delimiters are: linefeed, carrige return, tab and space
